    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vaje za koncentracijo pri branju</string>
            <string language="en">Reading exercises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseübungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercices de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercícios da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazioni della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicios de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">V dokumentu je več nalog, po dve na listu. Na prvi strani so navodila in predlogi za učitelja. Naloge lahko uporabimo vsak dan za pet minut, v skupini ali za posameznnega učenca. Naloge si lahko prilagajate.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of different exercises that can help develop greater concentration when reading.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">črka</string>
            <string language="en">letter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">beseda</string>
            <string language="en">word</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vaja</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koncentracija</string>
            <string language="en">concentration</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung unterschiedliche Übungen, die helfen 
können, grössere Konzentration beim Ablesen zu entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de différents exercices qui peuvent 
aider à développer une plus grande concentration en lisant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção dos exercícios diferentes que podem 
ajudar desenvolver uma concentração mais grande ao ler.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle esercitazioni differenti che 
possono contribuire a sviluppare la concentrazione più grande quando 
legge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των διαφορετικών ασκήσεων που μπορούν να 
βοηθήσουν να αναπτύξουν τη μεγαλύτερη συγκέντρωση κατά την 
ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección de diversos ejercicios que pueden 
ayudar a desarrollar la mayor concentración al leer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
